title: [Large-scale] Simulation-Based Collaborative Scientific Inquiry Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific terminology and fundamental digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Team-based project execution in a virtual laboratory environment using VR devices, with experiential learning of real-world scientific problem-solving through online collaboration tools and simulation software.

learning_goals: Learners can form teams of three or more in a VR environment to analyze scientific problems and collaboratively propose solutions.
Learners can integrate team members' ideas and operate a structured discussion process for knowledge construction using digital collaboration tools.
Learners can verify scientific hypotheses based on simulation data, generate visual outputs, and integrate them into project portfolios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
